page.title: 16Attitudes.
page.content: The children of Broomhaugh First School interviewed thirty people in the village of Riding Mill. The questions and answers are as follows:- 1. Do you like living in Riding Mill? Everyone asked said "Yes". Reasons:- a friendly village peaceful and quiet beautiful countryside easy access to buses and trains. 2. What changes have there been in the village? Increase in the population. New housing developments. Building of A.68 to by-pass village and new bridge over the River Tyne. New village First School. Closure of surgery and shops. Street lighting installed. Station is now unmanned. Construction of Pumping Station.
